instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons, 'recharts' for charts, 'framer-motion' for animations, 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for class utilities.
2. THEME: Implement the Dark Mode palette in 'tailwind.config.js'. Ensure 'darkMode: class' is set. Use Slate-900 as the main background, not pure black.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component with a fixed sidebar (w-64) and a top header. Use 'Outlet' for page content.
4. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI components for complex interactions (Select, Dialog, Calendar, Table). Customize them to match the 'Glassmorphism' style defined in 'visual_enhancers'.
5. PAGES: Build '/login' with the blue glass building background. Build '/dashboard' with a Bento grid of metrics (Projects, Tasks, Payments).
6. CHARTS: Use Recharts for the 'Pipeline' and 'Activity' charts. Style them with the defined chart colors (Blue, Indigo, Emerald).
7. ANIMATION: Add subtle entrance animations (fade-in-up) to all dashboard cards using Framer Motion.
8. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark backgrounds. Use 'text-slate-200' for body text, not 'text-gray-500'.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: DO NOT use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetric grids.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Ensure all containers with borders have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).
Never use pure black (#000000). Use tinted dark greys (#0f172a).
